revised_title: Advances in Internal Ballistics: Determination of Burning Rates and Pressure-Density Relations
tldr: This article investigates the principles of internal ballistics, focusing on the determination of burning rates and pressure-density relations in propellants. The authors develop methods to analyze the effects of cooling and heat conduction on the explosion process, providing insights into the behavior of propellants in real-world conditions. Their findings contribute to the understanding and improvement of ballistic calculations and applications.
